definition: Gu county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi
surname Gu
ancient/old/paleo-
county

sentences.english: Rich tourism resources in the ancient county.
Explain the social and cultural background of Guxian.
sentences.chinese: 阐释古县的社会文化背景。

sentences.english: The first chapter:an overview of Guxian social history and culture.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，概述古县的社会历史与文化。

sentences.english: Ancient County is located in southern Shanxi, Linfen, north-east.
sentences.chinese: 古县位于山西南部，临汾东北。

sentences.english: Thus, we can learn more the inner world of the Guxian ancient people.
sentences.chinese: 由此，我们可以了解到更多古县人民的内心世界。

sentences.english: The second chapter:the overview of the existing folk music.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，古县民间音乐调查概述。
